alerts.message:
Severe Thunderstorm Watch 457 remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT
for the following locations


OK 
. Oklahoma counties included are

Alfalfa Beckham Blaine 
Custer Dewey Ellis 
Garfield Grant Greer 
Harmon Jackson Kay 
Kingfisher Kiowa Logan 
major Noble Payne 
Roger Mills Washita Woods 
Woodward

...Significant weather advisory for southwestern Logan County until
800 PM CDT...

At 726 PM CDT...a strong thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of
Cashion...moving northeast at 15 mph.

Hazards include...
hail up to one-half inch diameter... 
wind gusts to 40 mph...

Locations impacted include...
Guthrie...Cashion...Cedar Valley...Seward and Navina. 

Precautionary/preparedness actions...

Monitor the weather situation closely and be alert for threatening
weather conditions.


Lat...Lon 3595 9745 3573 9734 3573 9765 3581 9767
time...Mot...loc 0026z 232deg 12kt 3579 9761 


11
